name: Loaded Dice (BuhPoi)
description:
Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022

Controls

Move - WASD

Aim - Mouse

Shoot - Hold LMB

Load Dice - Hold RMB and select with LMB (make sure to hold RMB all the way through!)

How To Play

Defend the King while dodging bullets and enemies shooting explosive dice. The dice do little damage by default but can be turned into explosions by rolling a number that adds up with nearby enemy's number to equal the card in the center. For example, if the card in the center is a 5, then rolling 2 on a dice next to a green enemy with 3 cubes will do extra damage.  

You can take advantage of this by loading your dice using the Right Mouse Button to land on whatever roll you want, or choose to roll random numbers. Be careful to not shoot too many dice at once or you will become slower. Survive all 10 waves to win!

Credits

Programs used - Unity, Aseprite, Audacity

Music from Zapsplat.com
